name: Constellations (Raindrinker)
description:
Mimimalistic numbers puzzle

Controls:

  • Mouse only. 
  • Click and drag to connect stars.
  • Click and drag to cut connections.

Puzzle rules:

  • Number indicates connected stars. In the stars with a black circle, number indicates size of the constellation that star is in.

-------------------------

Beautiful shaders done by FreezedIce

Made for #GodotWildJam21

Hope you like it!
